titles.title: Providing Child Care for Police Officers Act of 2025
Providing Child Care for Police Officers Act of 2025

To establish a grant pilot program to provide child care services for the minor children of law enforcement officers to accommodate the shift work and nontraditional work hours of such officers, and to enhance recruitment and retention of such officers.
